programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: Amber Rose vs. Kanye West
programme.desc: S1:E5 it true that Kanye West was harassing Amber Rose when she suddenly left him? When Kanye West started dating Amber Rose, he took her from the life of being a stripper to the global superstar world. At first, they seemed like a couple that was truly in love. But when Amber suddenly left Kanye, his attitude towards her completely changed. Our team uncovered the real story behind the tabloids of the years of bullying, unwanted media attention, and attacks that Amber had to suffer. The true story will reveal why she was the special woman Kanye fell in love with in the first place, and what she and Kim Kardashian have in common.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Ariana Grande vs. Pete Davidson
programme.desc: S1:E11 What made Kanye West go to war against Pete Davidson? Kanye is relentlessly going after Pete, so much so, that Kim Kardashian is concerned about the safety of her new boyfriend. Is it because Kanye knows Pete’s history of controversial relationships? Our team got the real story behind the tabloids, the truth behind Pete’s behavior in relationships, and the journey he went on to truly start loving who he is.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: Rise Above Shame
programme.desc: Iyanla Vanzants husband mistreated her for years -- threatening their children and trapping her with fear of greater violence. She shares how she found the strength to leave and escape the cycle.

programme.title: Pardeep Kaleka: Empathy - The Path From Darkness to Light
programme.desc: This is the remarkable story of Pardeep Kaleka, a faithful Sikh believer, and his quest to track down his fathers killer. In his search for truth, he bonded with a former White Supremacist. What did they have in common? And how did their friendship transform lives around the world? Forgiveness is a powerful tool to heal ourselves, connect deeply, and truly make our world better. Who do you need to forgive today?

programme.title: Tupac Shakur: Fight For A Better World
programme.desc: Legendary hip hop artist Tupac Shakur left this world far too early, but it’s clear that he and his music had a lasting impact. Surrounded by violence and injustice Tupac fought for a better world.

programme.title: Elon Musk: Revenge of the Geeks
programme.desc: Visionary entrepreneur, Elon Musk achieved the impossible with SpaceX and Tesla, but Elon’s success made people question his “real intentions”. A look inside his childhood reveals why Elon lived in fear as a child, and why he never talks about his father...

programme.title: Deontay Wilder - Box For Life
programme.desc: American heavyweight champion Deontay Wilder reveals the heartbreaking reason why he got into boxing and the one person who inspired him to never give up fighting to become the World Champion.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Beyond Borders: Investing Globally
programme.desc: How do you feel about investing beyond our borders? In todays global interconnected economy it is almost impossible to avoid international exposure. Now more than half of the worlds market capitalization lies outside of the United States, investing globally offers the opportunity for improved portfolio diversification and long-term growth. Financial professionals Joe Anderson and Alan Clopine discuss the pros and cons of investing beyond our borders and highlight the various avenues for investing around the world.

programme.title: Home Affordability Problem & How America Got Hooked on Company Culture
programme.desc: Fewer young people than ever before are going to be able to buy a house in their lifetime, and at the same time homes are getting more expensive every year… But if nobody can afford to buy a house then how do they keep getting more expensive? A family home should be the bedrock of your financial life, it gives you somewhere to live while building up equity in a place that you can one day call your own. Owning a home with a thirty-year mortgage is cheaper out of pocket every month in most cities than renting, so if you can buy your own home, you will be richer now and richer in the future. You already know this, but if you are in the seventy-five [75] of my audience that doesn’t own a home it’s probably because you can’t afford one. According to a report by Redfin only twenty one percent [21] of homes that went on sale in 2022 were considered affordable, that’s down for SIXTY percent [60] of homes on sale in 2021. That means in just one year two thirds of ALL affordable housing became too expensive for the average American. The team conducting this survey concluded that housing affordability is at its lowest point in history. But what’s the end game here? If people can’t afford a home, then house prices can’t go up anymore… Right? Wrong… I don’t want to make another one of those stupid finfluencer videos about how the housing market is going to crash in three point five days but there are three reasons why it could get a lot worse before it gets better. The first reason is that houses do not need to be affordable for you to buy one. If you think that can’t make sense, there is an entire industry working to make it true. You don’t save money to buy a house, you save money for a down payment. Wages have not kept up with house prices but a twenty percent [20] down payment only grows at one fifth [1/5th] the rate in absolute terms so people are still able to get into the market. According the Zillow the average home sold in America in 2020 traded for two hundred and thirty thousand dollars [$230,000]. At the start

programme.title: America's Dangerous Obsession with Entrepreneurship
programme.desc: "I dont need to tell you about all of the problems with celebrity culture, but America has a more damaging obsession that most people instinctively root for. Entrepreneur culture is costing everybody a lot of money even if they never start a business of their own. So, its time to learn How Money Works to find out why most people shouldnt be entrepreneurs even when everybody says its the greatest thing ever."

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Eight Years of Bad! for July 16, 2025
programme.desc: July 16, 2017. A day that will live in infamy. It was the day that Sir Lord Travis Wright and I invaded the beaches of Normandy… no, it was the day that we got on a space shuttle to become astronauts… well, ok. It was the day we decided to say words about Bitcoin, record them, and share them with the world. Perhaps not as epic as one would like, but it was a pretty big deal for us. Now, eight years later, we are the third longest-running Bitcoin podcast in the english language. Is humanity better for it? Probably not. But we’re still here and today we discuss what eight years in this space looks and feels like. Come with us on a walk down memory lane on this crazy crypto ride

Moana Waiwai
programme.desc: This film follows the FreeSwim journey of wahine (woman) Ally Davey as she takes on 70km of open ocean around the stunning Coromandel coastline over three days to bring awareness to the protection of New Zealand’s oceans. It does more than encapsulate stunning vistas and highlight the extraordinary New Zealand environment, but inspires people to be aware of the natural beauty that surrounds them and to protect it before it is too late. It’s an inspirational film, not an activist film.

programme.title: Whistler
programme.desc: Tag along as the TGR crew heads to Whistler, British Columbia to create an insane terrain park. While waiting for bluebird weather the athletes release some of their angst by doing some bungee jumping off a bridge.

programme.title: Disko
programme.desc: Eccentric French skipper Olivier Huin builds his own wooden boat and takes it into some of the most treacherous waters in the world. Skipper Olivier invites 8 crewmates to join him as he attempts to sail North from Virginia (USA) deep into the Arctic circle in search of the legendary Disko Bay.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Almost Ablaze
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a look behind the scenes of Almost Ablaze, TGR's 2014 film. Athletes and crew alike push the limits of what's possible in the world of ski films.

programme.title: Kayak Fishing Lake Erie
programme.desc: Fishing and kayaking is an unbeatable combination, as it allows you to fish in places inaccessible by boat or foot. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he meets up with Baer Fishing Adventures to chase pike and bass from their kayaks in the marshes surrounding Long Point Bay in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County.

programme.title: Deep Water
programme.desc: Deep Water is a captivating exploration of fear, mentorship, and deep water soloing in panoramic Ha Long Bay, Vietnam with psicobloc pioneer Tim Emmett and competition climber Kyra Condie. Watch as Kyra learns from the master, tackles the fear of climbing high above the water, and then succeeds on one of the hardest deep water solos in Vietnam, The Lightning Crack, graded 5.13. Ha Long Bay, Vietnam is a scenic climbing venue with over 3000 limestone formations dotting the ocean bay.

programme.title: The World of Waves
programme.desc: “The World of Waves” is an astonishing look at the ocean and the waves it creates to all the corners of the world. This film is completely shot on 35mm film as well as on the Red and Phantom camera’s. The visuals are nothing short of mind blowing, backed up with a soundtrack that puts you right in the action. This film embraces images that will last in your mind for eternity. Never before have angles and images in the ocean been captured in pure raw form.

programme.title: Ballan
programme.desc: Biopic on Alessandro Ballan, the Italian cyclist who became World Champion in 2008, before the absurd disqualification for doping, subsequently being fully absolved after a long battle for the truth.

programme.title: FIM X-Trial
programme.desc: The seventh scoring event for the 2024 X-Trial World Championship, returns once again to Pamplona

programme.title: Michelin 12H Misano
programme.desc: Endurance racing heads to Italy as the 24H Series takes on the iconic Misano World Circuit. GTs and touring cars battle through the night in this demanding 12-hour showdown under the lights of the Adriatic coast.

programme.title: GoodWood: Surtees Trophy
programme.desc: The sight of Surtees in a Lola T70 was just as normal as in a Ferrari Formula 1 car

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: The future of American road racing is here. See the rising stars of the Parts Unlimited Talent Cup go head-to-head in Race 1 at Road America.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Parts Unlimited Talent Cup by Motul
programme.desc: These young racers are making big names for themselves. Race 2 at Road America saw bold passes and close finishes as the Talent Cup field proved why they’re the future of MotoAmerica.

programme.title: The 900 Series
programme.desc: Gary services the transmission on a 1990 964; Brant explains the differences in heaters in air-cooled cars vs. water cooled cars; Blake troubleshoots a Caymen overfilled with oil

programme.title: Material Girls
programme.desc: Our material girls, Angela Wolf, Ellen March and Ebony Love have some great fabrics choices as they take three projects step by step. Angela moves to our first lesson on the trendy top and front placket, then it’s a fun new fabric – cork on a tote bag with Ellen. We finish with a quilt project featuring last week’s block with Ebony.

programme.title: Pack and Go
programme.desc: Be ready to go -- anywhere, anytime. Sewing blogger and busy Mom Caroline Critchfield stays packed and ready with a handy bag made with clear vinyl and colorful fabric. Award-winning quilter Carolina Moore takes along paper-piecing projects so she can keep stitching wherever she goes. Alex Woodbury shares a charity sewing project.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: India has its own original look, or we should say multiple looks! Whether bold jewel tones, musical metals and bells, or a more mystical element, this is a style easily recognized. Kate Richbourg demonstrates Bollywood bracelets. Then Kim O'Neill introduces us to prayer beads or malas - a traditional tool used to count the number of times a mantra is recited, or breaths while meditating.

programme.title: Inspired by Books and Movies
programme.desc: Personalize your style with custom colors. Author and designer Cathy Jakicic weaves beaded components and makes them multifunctional. Teens and tweens will love to make the charm necklace that Candie Cooper creates as she joins Katie Hacker in Katie's Beading Lesson.

programme.title: Cards for Everyday Occasions
programme.desc: Every occasion no matter how big or small deserves a card – and today we've got designs for everyday occasions. Today's soup includes lacy pop up cards with a graphic design, some tasty treat cards featuring a lemonade stand with Sara Naumann, and translating a layout into a card with Nancy Nally. Lots of cards and ingredients in one Scrapbook Soup.

programme.title: In the Eyes of an Artist
programme.desc: An artist sees things differently -- they have a unique way of looking at the world and interpreting it into art. First, we look at Mary Cassatt, an American painter and printmaker known for her portrayal of women and children and create a project showing the bonds between mother and child. Using a totally different perspective, Joe Rotella, creates a kaleidoscope guaranteed to alter the way you see the world. We finish up with Ardith Goodwin and a Kandinsky inspired work -- starting with a photo of a house and using chalk and neon to create her canvas.

programme.title: Knitting
programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Knitting
programme.desc: Learn to knit with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Star Power
programme.desc: The thing about quilting is there's always room to grow, even for the midnight quilter! This episode's all about reflecting on personal growth. Well, that and how to put a modern spin on a traditional block we all know and love.

programme.title: Stories of the Protectors
programme.desc: The Jewish Foundation for the Righteous honors non-Jewish rescuers who saved Jews fleeing from the horrors for Holocaust, including Master Sgt. Roddie Edmonds (United States), Wladyslaw Misiuna (Poland) and the Jakubowski family (Poland).

programme.title: Daily News from Israel
programme.desc: A daily English-language newscast direct from the State of Israel

programme.title: Chief Crazy Horse
programme.desc: Crazy Horse thwarts the Army's efforts to catch him. His wife brings their ill daughter to see the Army doctor. Crazy Horse kills the doctor and the child dies. Crazy House continues to elude capture. Original Air Date: 4/30/54.

programme.title: Milt Sharp
programme.desc: Matt and Margaret investigate the kidnapping of banker Penrose. They immediately suspect noted bandit Milt Sharp, who recently escaped from a NV prison. A showdown takes place at the Penrose home. Original Air Date: 2/28/1955.

programme.title: Brass Collar
programme.desc: Annie is called on to help find three men involved in a train robbery. The manager's son tells his father that he's taking over, believing his father is no longer capable of his job. Original Air Date: 1/09/54.

programme.title: Trigger Twins
programme.desc: Annie faces double duty when she matches wits with Dana and Jana Matthews, twin sisters. With pistols and boots, she has to do battle with this dynamite duo. Original Air Date: 3/6/1955

programme.title: The Psychiatrist Gets Clampetted
programme.desc: Jethro gets his bill of health so he can graduate 5th grade, but Dr. Twombly wants to talk to Grannie again. Drysdale brings him as Grannie shows Pearl a love potion, so everyone thinks Twombly is interested in Grannie. Original Air Date: 5/15/1963.

programme.title: Elly Becomes A Secretary
programme.desc: When Miss Hathaway gets sick and Mr. Drysdale has to speak at a conference, Jed helps out by running the bank and has Elly as his secretary. Jethro finds a speech that Drysdale accidentally uses instead of his own. Original Air Date: 5/22/1963.

programme.title: Night of the Seagulls (1975)
programme.desc: In this final installment of the Blind Dead series, a doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village where he plans to start a practice only to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.

programme.title: Night of the Seagulls (1975)
programme.desc: In this final installment of the Blind Dead series, a doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village where he plans to start a practice only to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.

programme.title: Night of the Seagulls (1975)
programme.desc: In this final installment of the Blind Dead series, a doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village where he plans to start a practice only to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.

programme.title: Magic Mummy (1933)
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are police officers, driving around in their car and enjoying listening to some music on their police radio, when they hear a bulletin announcing another theft of a mummy from the local museum. They stumble upon the culprit, a mysterious and ghoulish man who is carrying a coffin through a secret door in a cemetery. They sneak in after him and watch him command the mummy to life; it is a beautiful woman, who he then commands to sing for his audience of skeletal theatre-goers. Tom and Jerry break up the evening and try to escape with the stolen goods, with mixed results.

programme.title: Motel Hell
programme.desc: Dark Rewind is a nostalgic TV series where August Kyss, a charismatic and quirky host, transports viewers back to 1984 as she dives into classic 80s horror films from the comfort of her neon-lit bedroom. The show blends campy humor, insightful commentary, and a love for all things horror. Each episode celebrates the iconic films, cheesy tropes, and retro culture that defined 80s horror, creating a time capsule of terror and fun for fans old and new.

programme.title: Rabid (2019)
programme.desc: The quiet Rose works in women's fashion clothing, hoping to be a designer. A traffic accident damages her face. She gets experimental stem cell treatment, leaving her stronger and prettier than ever - but there's a side effect.

programme.title: Rabid (2019)
programme.desc: The quiet Rose works in women's fashion clothing, hoping to be a designer. A traffic accident damages her face. She gets experimental stem cell treatment, leaving her stronger and prettier than ever - but there's a side effect.

programme.title: MAC DADDY & THE LOVERS
programme.desc: Mac Giani (Mac Jay) is a notorious ladies man who takes pleasure in seducing women and making them fall in love. He becomes a legend in the town and is well-skilled in breaking hearts. His skills earn the respect of two friends, who experience the hardships of falling in and out of love and become jaded about finding true love. In a twist of fate, their teacher becomes the student, as Mac unexpectedly falls in love and must confront his dark past to save his dismal future.

programme.title: GHOSTFINDERS
programme.desc: A group of television personalities, renowned for their popular show in which they hunt ghosts and other paranormal phenomenon, encounter a real-life haunting which proves to be more dangerous than anything theyve portrayed on their show

programme.title: TO KILL FOR LOVE
programme.desc: Gaspard de la Roche, a man of inestimable wealth, was found dead in his castle, leaving a huge legacy of 50 million. But is it an accident or murder? No one knows. His beautiful young woman, single claimant, in turn, is in great danger. Someone appears desperate to seize the property of the deceased millionaire.

programme.title: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards 2017
programme.desc: Ananda Vikatan Cinema Awards is an annual awards ceremony for people in the Tamil film industry. It is presented by the Tamil language weekly magazine Ananda Vikatan. The awards were introduced in the year 2008, honouring the films that were released in 2007.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 41
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Interview with Director Ameer

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 20
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Ghost Mansion
programme.desc: Keet and Cat’s chase ends up in a haunted house…with a crazy ghost living in it. The ghost loves Keet and wants to have her as a pet for himself.

programme.title: FIRE AWAY!
programme.desc: On a chilly morning, Xia tries to heat things up with his Golden Katana, but keeps accidentally setting fires. He does no better as the Dragon Warrior. When Negu sends a mutant Heat Monster, the Guardians will have to fight fire with fire…or possibly water.

programme.title: Office Fiasco
programme.desc: Don gets a new office job and he is so excited to begin. Are the rats equally excited?? well they are – but for something else. With their pranks and tricks, Larry Marly and Charly make sure that Don doesnt reach his office. But, when he somehow reaches the office, they make sure that the boss throws him out finally.

programme.title: WHATS IN A NAME
programme.desc: Sundar is trying to oust Basha as usual from the shop when he accidentally damages the signboard of the tea-shop. Moustache bristling, Chai Raja assigns Sundar the task of painting a new signboard for the tea shop but Basha is all set to botch it up. Each time Sundar paints on the hotels name, Basha streaks in wrecking havoc. he sometimes adds unnecessary caricatures of Chai Raja to the signboard, at yet others tweaks the spelling and even adjusts it so that it falls on a couple of unsuspecting customers causing Chai Rajas heart to palpitate. Sundar better pull up his paws and get on with the job for Chai Raja is as fond of his hotels exotic name as he is of serving up his exotic brews. FinallySundar loses and a mad chase and crash against the kitchen counter Sundar gulps sure that he is going to get the boot...but Chai Raja is grinning. The new signboard goes up and gets a big thumbs-up from everyone it spells the hotel name in tea-stains (with banana fritters and tea sieves interspersed). Sundar heaves a sigh of relief...for once!

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: New Point of View - Pancake
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Love Me Not
programme.desc: Don is sitting in the bathtub, smiling. He slips down further and gets comfy as he lies in the tub.He turns over and pulls the cushion around his neck closer. Only, it’s not a cushion. It’s an OCTOPUS!And its in love with Colonel!

programme.title: Panda-Monium
programme.desc: Maestro Woof needs the kind of bamboo that the Purple Panda eats so he can make a new flute, and he sends the Guardians to find some. Xia criticizes April’s skills as a pilot, so she decides to take the Lord of the Wind on a practice run while her friends look for the bamboo. When Xia and Pai are captured by a Mutant Purple Panda, April gets to show off her piloting prowess as she rescues them, and at the same time gathers the bamboo they need.

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: MEOW HELP YOU?
programme.desc: It is not a good morning for Sundar as he is messing up the orders. Then a very sophisticated apron clad thin wiry man comes to the shop. Within seconds, he convinces Chai Raja of his efficiency and skill both in and around the kitchen and is instantly employed. Chai Raja is super impressed and the next moment, Sundar is kicked out of the shop. Sundar tears his hair- he has to get rid of the man- but the man despite his suave look is extremely streetwise and fights dirty. Basha meanwhile too finds the man too cunning for his liking when he gets whacked a few times and agrees to team up with Sundar to put him out of commission. Together they manage to reveal the mans actual nature to Chai Raja and the customers and gets him ousted. As for their alliance, that goes out the window the second Sundar is presented back with his towel- the mark of his employment. The two chase and the chai pours as routine.

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: TRUNK CALL
programme.desc: Its a festival day and one of Chai Rajas customers has brought in a giant tusker who he parks outside the stall. But it is at the very same time that Sundar and Basha are steeped in a blind chase- a pan comes flying and knocks the customer out. As others carry him off for some first aid, Chai Raja entrusts the elephant in Sundars care. Sundar is intimidated by the animal has no choice but to accept. Inquisitive Basha meanwhile discovers that the tusker is in fact nothing but a gentle giant Basha strikes a plan to use Sundars fear of the animal to lay hands on extra banana-fries. As Sundarworks , he spots the tuskers trunk snake in and suck in banana fritters. He jumps to confront the animal but comes up nose against the pointed tusks. And so the fritters keep disappearing, until Sundar spots Basha hi-fiving the tusker. Furious, Sundar decides to teach the both of them a lesson and rigs a watery trap to drench Basha and the tusker, but the trap malfunctions and it all ends in the massive tusker, sliding behind first ramming into the stall and the tea shop board reads Hotel Cali Torn- Ia!

programme.title: Trash Planet
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: POT BOILER
programme.desc: Chai Rajas normal kettle is sent in for repair and Chai Raja, very hesitantly brings out the antique kettle that is his inheritance from his great granddad. With extreme care and caution (and reverence), he sets about making tea, but then there is a sudden visit by the politician who demands that Chai Raja sit with him to discuss about tea provision for the upcoming elections. Chai Raja cant refuse and Sundar has to take on the task of tea making while Chai Raja sits with the politician. Sundar, knowing Chai Rajas affections for the special kettle handles it with kid gloves but he doesnt anticipate Basha poking his tail in and thats when mayhem ensues. As Chai Raja glares intermittently from afar, Sundar desperately tries to keep the pot boiling without melting it up altogether. He is however distracted by the customers who dont much seem to like the taste of tea being served that day. Basha takes advantage of Sundars distraction and flicks the kettle. Sundar desperately tries to get it back. He lunges and manages to yank Basha by his tail, but this only sends the ancient kettle flying. Later we see Chai Raja tearfully hang up a new wind-chime (made of pieces of his antique kettle) and then glare at Sundar who has been assigned a tower of dishes to wash. Basha sniggers in the distance, blowing into the spout of the kettle, whistling the chai chaitune!

programme.title: Frozen Smighty Day
programme.desc: The Super Six are enjoying Frozen Smighty Day until Monster Birds threaten Smightyland. Its up to Dude and Melody to work together to get Nardys Freeze Ray back from Sneevils underground lair.

programme.title: NOW YOU TEA ME
programme.desc: Basha sits plotting his next move to divest the snack shelf off more kachoris when he is surprised to find his banana mocktail being drained by someone invisible. Basha soon finds out its a chameleon with a super camouflage- and the best part? If Basha too touches it, for a short while, he too can camouflage to merge with the immediate surrounding! Basha rushes to use the chameleon as to grab the kachoris. Sundar is indeed stumped for a while as he sees the kachoris magically disappear and pranks magically make him stumble and mess up the order. But then he hears Bashas chuckle and staying hidden, finds out Bashas secret. Sundar immediately tricks the chameleon out of Bashas hands and voila! Now Sundar is camouflaging. Gleefully, Sundar just starts exacting revenge when to his horror, he finds that the chameleon is an even bigger thief than Basha who is guzzling the tea as well as snacks set for the customers. Chai Raja who catches a glimpse of Sundar camouflaging after touching the chameleon and then watches the snacks and tea disappearing immediately suspects him. Sundar must now clear his image quick else he will be cleared out of Hotel California once and for all.

programme.title: The Wet Cat
programme.desc: Cat is chasing Keet in the mud and gets dirty, GrandPA is in the garden watering the plants he points the hose pipe to Cat and gets him wet and tells Dunky to give him a long due bath. Much to Keets amusement.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: Team Awesome
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: The Frogs Who Desired a King
programme.desc: Frogs are afraid of the snake who showed up in their lake one day. Frogs pray for the strong king who will protect them, and the God sends them the king in return.

programme.title: Blackberry Tea
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: What Goes Up
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Disapprearing Act
programme.desc: In the waking world, Odessa gets embarrassed, which makes her invisible in the Zooniverse. With the humorous help of the Zoonicorns she gains understanding and perspective – and becomes visible again! When you make the effort to understand your feelings, you can manage them and move forward from them in a positive way.

programme.title: The liquorice touch
programme.desc: The twins encounter Liquorice, a girl who turns everything she touches into something sweet. After a moment of enthusiasm they discover that she is not so happy about her talent

programme.title: King Pancake
programme.desc: PANCAKE wishes he could be king so that he alone could tell everyone else what to do – only to learn that being in charge isn’t as easy as it looks. Both leaders and helpers are needed to finish any job. Giving orders and taking orders are both important to get a job done.

programme.title: Rat Control
programme.desc: It looks like don has come to terms with Charly, Marly and Larry ; and that is not it, they are now friends!!! Colonel just cannot stand this atrocity. He is hiring experts after experts to destroy the rats. And at last the right person comes for the job. Will he succeed..?? You wish!!!!!!

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Coco Jumbo
programme.desc: It’s the time of the month when the coconuts from the trees have to be removed to be send the market for sale. GrandPA has entrusted Dunky to do this job.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: In a multi-coloured SUV, Don and Colonel with their bagpacks zipped are set for a camping trip. Watch them in close contact with nature and “trouble”.

programme.title: The dirtiest dinosaur
programme.desc: The twins learn the benefits of cleanliness when they encounter an ailing dinosaur.

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: Bird House
programme.desc: Dunky has just finished making a nice bird house for the new pigeon family and their new babies. The new family is grateful and Keet is their chosen godmother.

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: A sticky situation
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a sticky wrapper and the twins arrive in a sandy desert. They travel to the pond world and to the winter world before they can put it in a bin.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: I'm fine!
programme.desc: The twins encounter in the woods an owl who can’t see very well, but won’t admit it. Until the twins give him a strange pair of glasses.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Pinecone
programme.desc: Creativity has no limits, watch Hepi and Briko transform these cones into something lovely

programme.title: The Low Price of Fame
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: Polka dots
programme.desc: YoHe wants to be like YoShe. Together with his sister he jumps into a world in which everyone and everything is a copy of a copy and he learns how much important it is to be different

programme.title: The Note
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: Genesis
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Invisible Don
programme.desc: To take revenge on the rats, Don makes a potion for invisibility. He has one hell of a time playing with Charly, Marly Larry and even King Chomp. But there was some potion remaining. Oo la la! Who will drink it???

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: Shy Tommy Prickles
programme.desc: Mewmew is all set for her party but didn’t have sufficient time to handout the invitations. Deedee and Nino agree to help. They soon invite all of Abra-Dabra, but Tommy Prickles isn’t so keen on attending, because he feels so very shy. But as Deedee doesn’t have any spell to make Tommy’s shyness go away she improvises without magic by making Tommy believe that she has cast a spell on Tommy’s hat. Tommy agrees to attend the party in the guise that the hat he is wearing is now a chatter hat that will help him talk to others at the party. Nino is confused as he’s happy on one side that magic wasn’t used but sad that Tommy thinks magic is used. Tommy Prickles fits right in at the party and has fun playing with the Doobydoos and talks so freely and happily with everyone. Just then a huge gust of wind ruffles everything including Tommy’s hat. Poor sad Tommy feels so shy and helpless that he wants to go back home. But Deedee implores him to stay by trying to make him hopeful that Nino would return soon with Tommy’s hat. Tommy slumps on the ground and won’t budge, not until Deedee gets Tommy to don Tiggy’s baker hat. Tommy jumps springs back up and rounds all the party goers to teach them his very own special Wiggly Worm dance. Just then as they all dance in a bee-line behind Tommy, Nino flies in with Tommy’s hat. A confused Tommy discovers that he was wearing Tiggy’s hat till then and is flabbergasted to know that Deedee didn’t work any magic into the hat all along. Tommy Prickles runs away crying. Tommy reasons with Deedee that all of Abra-Dabra will think of him as silly, but Deedee tells him that if he couldn’t believe her, then to at least believe those who love having him along. Tommy looks up to see all his friends walking up to him doing the Wiggly Worm dance. Tommy takes a brave step and listens to his friends wanting have him back. He joins them just the way he is, without his ‘magic’ hat. Deedee finally agrees with Nino that sometimes no magic is good.

programme.title: Dancing Boots
programme.desc: There are a pair of boots in the window of the Fortune Tellers shop and theyre not for sale as theyre enchanted. Hoping that the boots will give him wonderful powers, Aladdin slips them on and finds himself dancing. Its funny and he loves it, until he tries to stop and cant and so out he dances into the street. Jamillah runs for Genie and together they find some tricky, funny way to waylay Aladdin and remove the boots.

programme.title: Take A Dance On Me
programme.desc: Pancake is terrible dancer, and when he joins the Zoonicorns in their dances to make flowers bloom, his issues could disrupt springtime. You dont have to be perfect at something to enjoy it.Feelings are as important as skills.

programme.title: Burping Boulders
programme.desc: Afraid of the loud thunder in the waking world, Maple discovers in the Zooniverse that Ene fears something too - the mysterious and loud burping boulders. Together they go on a journey to face their fears - and find fun along the way. With persistence you can overcome your fears… and sharing your feelings is the start of a solution

programme.title: Hungabunga
programme.desc: Sneevils evil plant, the hunga bunga, grows out of control and captures the Smighties. Its up to Dude and his fish friends to stop it.

programme.title: Genie Ball
programme.desc: Genie, Aladdin and Jamillah are playing an enchanted version of football - Genie Football! The Princess can hear all the fun from inside the palace and wishes she could join in but the Grand Vizier wont let her out. She sneaks out disguised as a washer woman and is quickly hit by the enchanted football. As soon as she touches it she falls into a deep slumber. Thats what happens when Princesses mess with Genie magic. Now they need to find a prince to kiss her and wake her up before the guards find her with our gang and arrest them for kidnapping. But Jamillah remembers that Aladdin will one day become a prince and convinces him to do it. Reluctantly he does and the princess wakes just before the palace guards burst in.

programme.title: Sleepwalker
programme.desc: Gummy sleepwalks – making himself an elaborate snack and proving that you can sometimes even have fun while you’re asleep!

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Yogi Don
programme.desc: One fine day a courier comes for Don – a yoga training guide. Now Don is all yogic and spiritual. Phew!! The trio just can’t take all this. And when they get into action, Don sees all seven heavens from the yoga mat itself.

programme.title: Better Than You
programme.desc: Pancake must come to terms with not being better at something than his little sister Maple, which is mirrored in the Zooniverse when he tries to help the Zoonicorns build Jiggly Stone wall. Even when you’re not the best at something, you can always be helpful.

programme.title: The Fly-Away Nightingale
programme.desc: Whilst picking some fruit, Aladdin accidentally lets the Sultans precious nightingale go free. Genie is convinced that he can call him back using a spell but he cant remember where it is, so Jamillah and Aladdin run after it. They chase the bird to the market where he lands on a traders stall and Jamillah must outwit the trader using her modern phone to get him back. Finally Jamillah and Aladdin call Genie to use the magic carpet to retrieve it and Genie remembers the right spell just in time.

programme.title: Fred’s Close Shave
programme.desc: Fred wishes he could look older, so Nora would like him as much as her pop star crush “Romeo Romero.” When he learns about the hair growth bugs that made Brains grow a beard-- he purposely uses them on himself. Now, whenever Friday shaves it off their beards, they grow back longer!

programme.title: How Us Your Pawns – Seven Little Kids
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, the elf Fo, travel into the story of the “Seven Little Kids”, having been called out by MOTHER GOAT. The WOLF is prowling around the house, waiting for a chance to eat her seven LITTLE KIDS, and she has to travel to another town to see to a very important matter. The detective and her assistant will have to use all their ingenuity to prevent the ferocious WOLF from getting into the house, while at the same time playing babysitter to 7 naughty, undisciplined little goats

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Balloons to Baghdad
programme.desc: Jamillah brings balloons to Baghdad and everyone is thrilled with this new invention, they sell one to everyone, even the Grand Vizier buys one for the Princess. Suddenly they hear a popping sound! Jamillah explains to Aladdin that is what happens to balloons but the people of Baghdad are not happy, they all want their money back. Jamillah and Aladdin hide when they hear the sound of the Grand Vizier approaching. Samir tries to convince them to face the music but luckily they dont have to -it turns out the Princess loves the popping balloons and only wanted to come to thank Jamillah and Aladdin for bringing such joy to Baghdad!

programme.title: The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old magic lamp – complete with a genie popping out when he chances to rub it. The three pals suddenly have three wishes .

programme.title: Verano tardío
programme.desc: Libia ni se imagina que en el pueblo lejano donde pasó su infancia la espera un nuevo amor.

programme.title: Verano tardío
programme.desc: Libia ni se imagina que en el pueblo lejano donde pasó su infancia la espera un nuevo amor.

programme.title: Un amor (casi) perfecto
programme.desc: Julie tiene 36, está sin trabajo y soltera, así que ha decidido tomar las riendas de su destino.

programme.title: Under China's Shadow: Decades of Suppression on American Soil
The CCP's Covert War in the USA
America The Beautiful
programme.desc: Experience the breathtaking landscapes and diverse natural wonders of our beautiful America from our mountains, lakes and shining seas.

programme.title: The Armstrong Williams Show
programme.desc: Interviews with important government and political leaders.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: NTD Evening News
programme.desc: News from the U.S. and around the world.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Investigative reporter Joshua Philipp examines the deeper meaning behind the day's news.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Khat Al Mowajaha
programme.desc: Behind every pivotal decision lies an untold story. On “Khat Al Mowajaha”, decision-makers uncover the moments that changed the course of history—placing you at the vantage point of a witness rather than a spectator.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Outside The Box
programme.desc: A talk show tackling major news topics Al Arabiya-style.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Sports News
programme.desc: Satisfying the needs of sports enthusiasts, Al Arabiya features specialized sports programs which aim to provide in-depth news and analysis on regional and international events.

programme.title: Al Arabiya News
programme.desc: Be at the forefront of top stories, breaking news, current affairs and all there is to know in the Arab region and around the world.

programme.title: Sabah Al Arabiya
programme.desc: Start the day afresh with Al Arabiya’s morning show, equipping viewers with social and cultural news, a regional press review and sports and weather updates.

programme.title: Farhan Molazem Adam

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"
